Uses of Class
org.apache.flex.swf.types.CXFormWithAlpha

  • Packages that use CXFormWithAlpha 
    Package Description
    org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf  
    org.apache.flex.swf.tags
    This package contains classes and interfaces representing tags in a SWF file.
    org.apache.flex.swf.types
    This package contains classes and interfaces that represent data types that appear in SWF tags or in the SWF header.

    • Uses of CXFormWithAlpha in org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CXFormWithAlpha TypeHelper.cxFormWithAlpha(double alphaMultiplier)
      Creates a SWF CXFormWithAlpha type for the common scenario where only an alpha multiplier has been specified.
      static CXFormWithAlpha TypeHelper.cxFormWithAlpha(double alphaMultiplier, double redMultiplier, double greenMultiplier, double blueMultiplier, double alphaOffset, double redOffset, double greenOffset, double blueOffset)
      Creates a SWF CXFormWithAlpha type for the given double precision values for ARGB multipliers and offsets.
